flavors.name: Chocolate Volcano
flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard explodes with OREO Cookie pieces, chopped Dove Chocolate pieces, mini M&Ms and streams of chocolate syrup.

flavors.name: Dark Chocolate Decadence
flavors.description: Premium blend of cocoas for the ultimate chocolate experience.

flavors.name: Caramel Pecan
flavors.description: Ribbons of old fashioned salted caramel swirled with our creamy Vanilla Fresh Frozen Custard and toasted pecan pieces. Taste why it's one of out most popular treats!

flavors.description: Dark Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard swirled with chocolate cake and novelty chocolate.

flavors.description: Our delicious Chocolate Fresh Frozen Custard with crunchy bits of Heath Bar. Kind of crunchy, kind of smooth, kind of incredible.
